data.introduce: 票面浏览服务是用于出票后浏览票面信息的服务，对应的主机指令是RTKT。
data.functions: 根据票号查询，浏览出票后的票面信息。
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketReviewRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票信息重取响应","children":[{"name":"AirTicketReview","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RTKTSegments","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息集合","children":[{"name":"RTKTSegment","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"@Stopover","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"经停点","children":[]},{"name":"@CityName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市名","children":[]},{"name":"@Carrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司","children":[]},{"name":"@Flight","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"@ClassCabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[]},{"name":"@Flightdate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞行日期","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞行时间","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"状态","children":[]},{"name":"@FareBasis","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价基础","children":[]},{"name":"@NotValidBeforeDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"生效时间","children":[]},{"name":"@NotValidAfterDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"失效时间","children":[]},{"name":"@Baggage","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行李额","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RTKTTaxs","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息集合","children":[{"name":"RTKTTax","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税信息","children":[{"name":"@TaxType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税类型","children":[]},{"name":"@TaxAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税数额","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TktOfficesInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出票OFFICE信息","children":[{"name":"@TktLocation","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票location","children":[]},{"name":"@TktOffice","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票office","children":[]},{"name":"@TktDevNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票打票机","children":[]},{"name":"@TktAgent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票Agnt工作号","children":[]}]},{"name":"Ticketing","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"客票信息","children":[{"name":"Carrier","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"中性出票航空公司","children":[{"name":"@CarrierName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"中性票出票航空公司名称","children":[]},{"name":"@CarrierNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"中性票出票航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"@HourIndicatorofIssuingTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票时间小时指标（只适用中性票）","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"票面信息","children":[{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"@Total","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"金额","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币","children":[]},{"name":"@FormofPayment","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付方式","children":[]},{"name":"@Endorsement","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]},{"name":"@Iata","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"IATA号","children":[]},{"name":"@IataInternationalSaleIndicator","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"IATA国际销售标识","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"object","qua
